findEmail.name: Name

findEmail.detail: * Please enter it in YYYYMMDD format. (Example: 20010101)

findPassword.content2: After verification through the email you entered during registration, please register a new password.

verified.title: Student verification completed.
verified.description: {{nickname}}, you have registered as a member of EwhaLang. Welcome!

unverified.description: You need to complete student verification with your school email to find EwhaLang friends.

pending.description: A verification email has been sent. Please check your inbox.

modal.message: A verification link has been sent to your email. Please check your inbox!

messages.reportReason: Please write the reason for reporting.
messages.leaveChatConfirm: If you leave the chat room, the chat list and conversation content will be deleted and cannot be recovered. Are you sure you want to leave the chat room?
messages.leaveChatComplete: You have left the chat room.
